name: AvocadosFromMexico
0:
”Alexa open Avocados From Mexico”
”Alexa, ask Avocados From Mexico to find me a yummy recipe”
”Alexa, ask Avocados From Mexico for avocado tips”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: avocados from mexico
des:
Hola, welcome to the Avocados From Mexico skill for Amazon Alexa. This skill is designed to help you explore the wonderful world of our favorite green fruit; the avocado. 

You can use this skill to search through our robust database of hundreds of guacamole recipes and healthy, delicious salads. We have a meal that will fit any occasion. Need a guacamole recipe with chicken? We have plenty of recipes to choose from! Craving a zesty avocado salad? No problem, let’s explore together. Follow along as we find you an avocado recipe, read out the ingredients, take you through the preparation directions or let us text you the recipe so you can purchase all the ingredients for your next meal.

Also, you can learn a few tips to help make you an avocado expert. Buying avocados soon? You can learn the best ways to select an avocado when you are shopping. Want to make sure your avocado is ripe when you're ready to use it? We can tell you great ways to speed up or slow down the ripening process. 

Find that perfect avocado recipe or learn more useful tips today with the Avocados From Mexico skill.

Why choose Avocados From Mexico? 

Because Avocados From Mexico are:

Always Fresh:
Whether it’s their fresh taste, their nearly infinite uses that provide you with fresh ideas, or the fact that they last for four to five days, avocados should always remain fresh in your mind.
 
Always Delicious
Guacamole is muy delicioso, that’s no secret; but did you know that avocados also shine in sweet desserts and smoothies? And that they also make a wonderful addition to quinoa and other whole-grain dishes? You can’t go wrong — avocados are always delicious.

Always in Season
There is never a time when you can’t pick up yummy Avocados From Mexico at your local grocery store. Why? Because Avocados From Mexico are always ready 365 days a year, 24 hours a day.
 
Learn more at AvocadosFromMexico.com
